text: Steven Fromholz (June 8, 1945 â€“ January 19, 2014) was an American entertainer, poet, singer and songwriter. He was the Poet Laureate of Texas in 2007. Fromholz was born in Temple, Texas on June 8, 1945. Fromholz began performing while he was serving in the United States Navy during the 1960s. After leaving the Navy, he teamed with Dan McCrimmon to create the group Frummox. Fromholz died on January 19, 2014 in a hunting accident when a rifle fell and discharged in El Dorado, Houston, Texas. He was 68 years old. == Related pages == *List of poets from North America ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * * * Category:1945 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Accidental deaths in the United States Category:Singer-songwriters from Texas Category:American poets Category:American entertainers Category:Deaths by firearm in Texas Category:People from Temple, Texas
title: Steven Fromholz
